MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at Arran Road to investigate the unplanned electricity fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.28pm on Friday 08 January 2021.
